item.description:
Venez bavarder!

Anne is working on a Portsmouth venue for next time. :-)

At La Festa, you may park on the street, in the side lot, or in the lot behind the building -- lots of options. Come on in and look for the Meetup table sign! I'll try to be as close to the door as possible.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language May Meetup #1
